# ğŸ“ GENERATED DIRECTORIES GUIDE

## ğŸ¯ **OVERVIEW**

This guide explains the purpose and management of directories that are automatically generated by development tools and testing frameworks.

---

## ğŸ“‚ **AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED DIRECTORIES**

### **âœ… `test-results/` - Playwright Test Results**

#### **Purpose:**
- **Generated by:** Playwright test runner
- **Contains:** Test execution results, screenshots, videos, traces
- **When created:** Every time Playwright tests are executed

#### **Typical Contents:**
```
test-results/
â”œâ”€â”€ .last-run.json                     # Metadata of last test run
â”œâ”€â”€ accessibility-test-chromium/        # Test-specific results
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test-failed-1.png             # Screenshots on failure
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ video-1.webm                  # Video recordings
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ trace.zip                     # Execution traces
â””â”€â”€ other-test-results/                # Additional test results
```

#### **Management:**
- **âœ… Keep in .gitignore** - Already configured
- **âœ… Auto-cleanup** - Playwright manages lifecycle
- **âœ… Safe to delete** - Will be regenerated on next test run
- **âš ï¸ Don't commit** - Contains large binary files

#### **Current Status:**
```json
// .last-run.json content
{
  "status": "passed",
  "failedTests": []
}
```

### **âœ… `playwright-report/` - Playwright HTML Reports**

#### **Purpose:**
- **Generated by:** Playwright HTML reporter
- **Contains:** Interactive HTML test reports
- **Access:** `npx playwright show-report`

#### **Management:**
- **âœ… In .gitignore** - Already configured
- **âœ… Regenerated** - On each test run with failures
- **âœ… Viewable locally** - Open in browser for detailed analysis

### **âœ… `node_modules/.vite/` - Vite Cache**

#### **Purpose:**
- **Generated by:** Vite development server
- **Contains:** Optimized dependencies and build cache
- **Critical for:** Fast development server startup

#### **Management:**
- **âœ… In .gitignore** - Already configured
- **ğŸ§¹ Clean when needed:** `rm -rf node_modules/.vite`
- **âš ï¸ Clean on issues:** Solves many development problems

### **âœ… `dist/` or `build/` - Production Builds**

#### **Purpose:**
- **Generated by:** Build process (`npm run build`)
- **Contains:** Optimized production-ready files
- **Used for:** Deployment to production servers

#### **Management:**
- **âœ… In .gitignore** - Already configured
- **ğŸš€ Deploy from here** - Contains final application
- **ğŸ§¹ Regenerated** - On each build command

---

## ğŸ› ï¸ **MANAGEMENT BEST PRACTICES**

### **âœ… Regular Cleanup:**

#### **Weekly Cleanup Script:**
```bash
#!/bin/bash
# cleanup-generated.sh

echo "ğŸ§¹ Cleaning generated directories..."

# Clean test results (keep .last-run.json)
find test-results/ -name "*.png" -delete 2>/dev/null
find test-results/ -name "*.webm" -delete 2>/dev/null
find test-results/ -name "*.zip" -delete 2>/dev/null

# Clean Playwright reports
rm -rf playwright-report/ 2>/dev/null

# Clean build artifacts
rm -rf dist/ build/ 2>/dev/null

echo "âœ… Cleanup completed"
```

#### **Deep Clean (when having issues):**
```bash
#!/bin/bash
# deep-clean.sh

echo "ğŸ”¥ Deep cleaning all generated files..."

# Clean all test artifacts
rm -rf test-results/ playwright-report/

# Clean Vite cache
rm -rf node_modules/.vite

# Clean build outputs
rm -rf dist/ build/

# Clean npm cache (optional)
npm cache clean --force

echo "âœ… Deep clean completed - restart dev server"
```

### **âœ… Monitoring Disk Usage:**

#### **Check Directory Sizes:**
```bash
# Check sizes of generated directories
du -sh test-results/ playwright-report/ node_modules/.vite/ dist/ 2>/dev/null
```

#### **Automated Size Monitoring:**
```bash
#!/bin/bash
# monitor-generated-dirs.sh

echo "ğŸ“Š Generated Directory Sizes:"
echo "=========================="

dirs=("test-results" "playwright-report" "node_modules/.vite" "dist" "build")

for dir in "${dirs[@]}"; do
    if [ -d "$dir" ]; then
        size=$(du -sh "$dir" 2>/dev/null | cut -f1)
        echo "ğŸ“ $dir: $size"
    else
        echo "ğŸ“ $dir: Not present"
    fi
done
```

---

## âš ï¸ **TROUBLESHOOTING COMMON ISSUES**

### **âœ… Test Results Issues:**

#### **Problem:** Test results accumulating, taking up space
```bash
# Solution: Clean old test results
find test-results/ -type f -mtime +7 -delete  # Delete files older than 7 days
```

#### **Problem:** Tests failing due to old artifacts
```bash
# Solution: Complete test cleanup
rm -rf test-results/ playwright-report/
npx playwright test  # Fresh test run
```

### **âœ… Vite Cache Issues:**

#### **Problem:** Development server not starting or behaving oddly
```bash
# Solution: Clear Vite cache
rm -rf node_modules/.vite
npm run dev  # Restart development server
```

#### **Problem:** Dependencies not updating
```bash
# Solution: Force dependency re-optimization
rm -rf node_modules/.vite
npm install
npm run dev
```

### **âœ… Build Issues:**

#### **Problem:** Build artifacts from previous builds causing issues
```bash
# Solution: Clean build and rebuild
rm -rf dist/ build/
npm run build
```

---

## ğŸ“‹ **GITIGNORE CONFIGURATION**

### **âœ… Current Configuration:**
```gitignore
# Test results and reports
test-results/
playwright-report/
playwright/.cache/

# Vite cache
.vite/

# Build outputs
dist/
build/

# Node modules
node_modules/
```

### **âœ… Verification:**
```bash
# Check what's ignored
git status --ignored

# Verify specific directories are ignored
git check-ignore test-results/ playwright-report/ node_modules/.vite/
```

---

## ğŸ”„ **AUTOMATION INTEGRATION**

### **âœ… Pre-commit Hook:**
```bash
#!/bin/bash
# .git/hooks/pre-commit

# Prevent committing generated directories
if git diff --cached --name-only | grep -E "(test-results|playwright-report|\.vite)" > /dev/null; then
    echo "âŒ Attempting to commit generated files!"
    echo "ğŸ§¹ Run cleanup script and try again"
    exit 1
fi
```

### **âœ… CI/CD Integration:**
```yaml
# GitHub Actions example
- name: Clean Generated Directories
  run: |
    rm -rf test-results/ playwright-report/ node_modules/.vite/
    
- name: Run Tests
  run: npm test
  
- name: Archive Test Results
  if: failure()
  uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
  with:
    name: test-results
    path: test-results/
```

---

## ğŸ“Š **MONITORING & MAINTENANCE**

### **âœ… Regular Checks:**

#### **Daily (Automated):**
- Monitor disk usage of generated directories
- Clean test artifacts older than 7 days
- Verify .gitignore is working

#### **Weekly (Manual):**
- Review test result patterns
- Clean up accumulated artifacts
- Check for any committed generated files

#### **Monthly (Review):**
- Evaluate cleanup scripts effectiveness
- Update .gitignore if needed
- Review CI/CD artifact handling

### **âœ… Health Indicators:**

#### **Good Signs:**
- âœ… Generated directories under 100MB total
- âœ… No generated files in git status
- âœ… Tests running consistently
- âœ… Development server starting quickly

#### **Warning Signs:**
- âš ï¸ Generated directories over 500MB
- âš ï¸ Git status showing ignored files
- âš ï¸ Slow test execution
- âš ï¸ Development server startup issues

#### **Critical Issues:**
- ğŸš¨ Generated files committed to repository
- ğŸš¨ Disk space issues from accumulated artifacts
- ğŸš¨ Tests failing due to artifact conflicts
- ğŸš¨ Build failures from cache corruption

---

## ğŸ¯ **SUMMARY**

### **âœ… Key Takeaways:**

1. **`test-results/`** is automatically managed by Playwright
2. **Safe to delete** - Will be regenerated as needed
3. **Already in .gitignore** - Won't be committed
4. **Contains test metadata** - Useful for debugging
5. **Regular cleanup recommended** - Prevents disk space issues

### **âœ… Best Practices:**
- **Monitor sizes** regularly
- **Clean old artifacts** weekly
- **Never commit** generated directories
- **Use cleanup scripts** for maintenance
- **Understand each directory's purpose**

### **âœ… When to Clean:**
- **Development issues** - Clean Vite cache
- **Test problems** - Clean test results
- **Disk space low** - Clean all generated directories
- **Before deployment** - Clean and rebuild

---

**Remember: Generated directories are temporary and safe to delete. When in doubt, clean and regenerate!** ğŸ§¹âœ¨

## ğŸ¯ **OVERVIEW**

This guide explains the purpose and management of directories that are automatically generated by development tools and testing frameworks.

---

## ğŸ“‚ **AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED DIRECTORIES**

### **âœ… `test-results/` - Playwright Test Results**

#### **Purpose:**
- **Generated by:** Playwright test runner
- **Contains:** Test execution results, screenshots, videos, traces
- **When created:** Every time Playwright tests are executed

#### **Typical Contents:**
```
test-results/
â”œâ”€â”€ .last-run.json                     # Metadata of last test run
â”œâ”€â”€ accessibility-test-chromium/        # Test-specific results
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test-failed-1.png             # Screenshots on failure
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ video-1.webm                  # Video recordings
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ trace.zip                     # Execution traces
â””â”€â”€ other-test-results/                # Additional test results
```

#### **Management:**
- **âœ… Keep in .gitignore** - Already configured
- **âœ… Auto-cleanup** - Playwright manages lifecycle
- **âœ… Safe to delete** - Will be regenerated on next test run
- **âš ï¸ Don't commit** - Contains large binary files

#### **Current Status:**
```json
// .last-run.json content
{
  "status": "passed",
  "failedTests": []
}
```

### **âœ… `playwright-report/` - Playwright HTML Reports**

#### **Purpose:**
- **Generated by:** Playwright HTML reporter
- **Contains:** Interactive HTML test reports
- **Access:** `npx playwright show-report`

#### **Management:**
- **âœ… In .gitignore** - Already configured
- **âœ… Regenerated** - On each test run with failures
- **âœ… Viewable locally** - Open in browser for detailed analysis

### **âœ… `node_modules/.vite/` - Vite Cache**

#### **Purpose:**
- **Generated by:** Vite development server
- **Contains:** Optimized dependencies and build cache
- **Critical for:** Fast development server startup

#### **Management:**
- **âœ… In .gitignore** - Already configured
- **ğŸ§¹ Clean when needed:** `rm -rf node_modules/.vite`
- **âš ï¸ Clean on issues:** Solves many development problems

### **âœ… `dist/` or `build/` - Production Builds**

#### **Purpose:**
- **Generated by:** Build process (`npm run build`)
- **Contains:** Optimized production-ready files
- **Used for:** Deployment to production servers

#### **Management:**
- **âœ… In .gitignore** - Already configured
- **ğŸš€ Deploy from here** - Contains final application
- **ğŸ§¹ Regenerated** - On each build command

---

## ğŸ› ï¸ **MANAGEMENT BEST PRACTICES**

### **âœ… Regular Cleanup:**

#### **Weekly Cleanup Script:**
```bash
#!/bin/bash
# cleanup-generated.sh

echo "ğŸ§¹ Cleaning generated directories..."

# Clean test results (keep .last-run.json)
find test-results/ -name "*.png" -delete 2>/dev/null
find test-results/ -name "*.webm" -delete 2>/dev/null
find test-results/ -name "*.zip" -delete 2>/dev/null

# Clean Playwright reports
rm -rf playwright-report/ 2>/dev/null

# Clean build artifacts
rm -rf dist/ build/ 2>/dev/null

echo "âœ… Cleanup completed"
```

#### **Deep Clean (when having issues):**
```bash
#!/bin/bash
# deep-clean.sh

echo "ğŸ”¥ Deep cleaning all generated files..."

# Clean all test artifacts
rm -rf test-results/ playwright-report/

# Clean Vite cache
rm -rf node_modules/.vite

# Clean build outputs
rm -rf dist/ build/

# Clean npm cache (optional)
npm cache clean --force

echo "âœ… Deep clean completed - restart dev server"
```

### **âœ… Monitoring Disk Usage:**

#### **Check Directory Sizes:**
```bash
# Check sizes of generated directories
du -sh test-results/ playwright-report/ node_modules/.vite/ dist/ 2>/dev/null
```

#### **Automated Size Monitoring:**
```bash
#!/bin/bash
# monitor-generated-dirs.sh

echo "ğŸ“Š Generated Directory Sizes:"
echo "=========================="

dirs=("test-results" "playwright-report" "node_modules/.vite" "dist" "build")

for dir in "${dirs[@]}"; do
    if [ -d "$dir" ]; then
        size=$(du -sh "$dir" 2>/dev/null | cut -f1)
        echo "ğŸ“ $dir: $size"
    else
        echo "ğŸ“ $dir: Not present"
    fi
done
```

```bash
    exit 1

```

```yaml
# GitHub Actions example

  run: |
    rm -rf test-results/ playwright-report/ node_modules/.vite/
    
- name: Run Tests
  run: npm test

    name: test-results
```

This guide explains the purpose and management of directories that are automatically generated by development tools and testing frameworks.

## ğŸ“‚ **AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED DIRECTORIES**

### **âœ… `test-results/` - Playwright Test Results**

#### **Purpose:**
- **Generated by:** Playwright test runner
- **Contains:** Test execution results, screenshots, videos, traces
- **When created:** Every time Playwright tests are executed

#### **Typical Contents:**
```
test-results/
â”œâ”€â”€ .last-run.json                     # Metadata of last test run

â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ test-failed-1.png             # Screenshots on failure
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ video-1.webm                  # Video recordings
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ trace.zip                     # Execution traces
â””â”€â”€ other-test-results/                # Additional test results
```

#### **Management:**
- **âœ… Keep in .gitignore** - Already configured
- **âœ… Auto-cleanup** - Playwright manages lifecycle

- **âš ï¸ Don't commit** - Contains large binary files

#### **Current Status:**
```json
// .last-run.json content
{
  "status": "passed",
  "failedTests": []
}
```

#### **Management:**
- **âœ… In .gitignore** - Already configured

### **âœ… `dist/` or `build/` - Production Builds**

#### **Purpose:**
- **Generated by:** Build process (`npm run build`)

## ğŸ› ï¸ **MANAGEMENT BEST PRACTICES**

### **âœ… Regular Cleanup:**

#### **Weekly Cleanup Script:**
```bash
#!/bin/bash
# cleanup-generated.sh

echo "ğŸ§¹ Cleaning generated directories..."

# Clean test results (keep .last-run.json)
find test-results/ -name "*.png" -delete 2>/dev/null
```

```bash
#!/bin/bash
```

### **âœ… Monitoring Disk Usage:**

#### **Check Directory Sizes:**
```bash
# Check sizes of generated directories
```

```bash
#!/bin/bash
# monitor-generated-dirs.sh

echo "ğŸ“Š Generated Directory Sizes:"
echo "=========================="

        echo "ğŸ“ $dir: Not present"
```
